author: Farkas Gabor
comment: The everything on one screen is a brilliant idea! However it's impossible to save recorded data. It doesn't export anything into Google fit. Useless.

author: JASON THOMPSON
comment: Works and connects just fine with my LG G Flex 2 and SW3.
title: Doesn't work on my Sony SmartWatch 3

author: Matthew
comment: Wear app works great, the android app could use a material design makeover
title: Its ok

author: Nicolas Schoonmaker
comment: A great free "runner" face with all the data you need.
title: Perfect

author: Parthasarathy Sampathnarayanan
comment: Google fit integration and heart accuracy needed

reply.author: Avoima Software
reply.content:
Google Fit integration is now added in the newest version.
Heart rate accuracy unfortunately depends strongly on the watch.

title: Needs improvement

author: Ryan Alcantara
comment: It does a good job differentiating between walking and resting. I like the dimming feature but wouldn't mind allowing the watch face to turn off completely. The obvious missing feature is the ability to save and track data. Pair that with Google Fit integration and we have a winner.
title: Basic but promising.
